Title: Hell Bent for Leather
Plot: Hank and Charlie's meeting with Robbie Mac isn't as promising as they hoped; and later, Hank reconnects with an entertainment exec he'd worked with. Meanwhile, Marcy, Ophelia and Karen swap tales over dinner, while Becca proves she's her father's daughter at a reading of her work.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Alissa Dean, Allison McAtee, Desiree Perry, Johann Urb, Maggie Wheeler
